alert.note: Alert for Grundy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 23 at 3:19AM CST until further notice by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Tennessee... Elk River Near Pelham affecting Grundy County. For the Elk River...including Pelham, Prospect...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Elk River Near Pelham. * WHEN...From early this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Water begins to inundate low lying wooded and agricultural areas along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 11.1 feet and rising. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Action stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 930 PM CST.
